attributes.action: To allow an MP to live on £64.30 a week for a period of six months, without any other source or means of income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As more and more people today are failing to be employed many have come to rely on Employment and Support Allowance of £64.30 per week.
How can individuals run their homes, pay their bills and live quietly without getting themselves into debt on £64.30 a week.
We petition and challenge an MP to live on £64.30 a week for a period of six months in their own home, without any other source or means of income.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
